FORGOTPASSWORD_INSTRUCTION_WRONG_USERNAM: Either username is wrong or we couldn't find an email associated with the username. Try again or call customer service for assistance.
FORGOTPASSWORD_INSTRUCTION_PROCESSING_ER: There was an error while processing your request. Try again or call customer service for assistance.
FORGOTPASSWORD_INSTRUCTION_USERNAME_TO_E: Enter the username to email you the instructions on how to reset password.
FORGOTPASSWORD_INSTRUCTION_EMAIL_SENT_SU: An email was sent to your registered email address. Follow the instructions in email on how to reset the password.
